name: AVCaptureStillImageOutput
desc: A capture output for capturing still photos in macOS.

items.name: func captureStillImageAsynchronously(from: AVCaptureConnection, completionHandler: (CMSampleBuffer?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Initiates a still image capture and returns immediately.

items.name: var isCapturingStillImage: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether a still image is being captured.

items.name: var isStillImageStabilizationActive: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether still image stabilization is in use for the current capture.

items.name: var automaticallyEnablesStillImageStabilizationWhenAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether still image stabilization should be automatically enabled.

items.name: var isStillImageStabilizationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the still image currently being captured supports still image stabilization.

items.name: var isHighResolutionStillImageOutputEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver should emit still images at the highest resolution supported by its source AVCaptureDevice objects activeFormat property.

items.name: var availableImageDataCVPixelFormatTypes: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The supported image pixel formats that can be specified as output settings.

items.name: var availableImageDataCodecTypes: [AVVideoCodecType]
items.desc: The supported image codec formats that can be specified as output settings.

items.name: var outputSettings: [String : Any]
items.desc: The compression settings for the output.

items.name: class func jpegStillImageNSDataRepresentation(CMSampleBuffer) -> Data?
items.desc: Returns an NSData representation of a still image data and metadata attachments in a JPEG sample buffer.

items.name: func captureStillImageBracketAsynchronously(from: AVCaptureConnection, withSettingsArray: [AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings], completionHandler: (CMSampleBuffer?, AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings?, Error?) -> Void)
var maxBracketedCaptureStillImageCount: Int
items.desc: Specifies the maximum number of still images that may be taken in a single bracket.

items.name: func prepareToCaptureStillImageBracket(from: AVCaptureConnection, withSettingsArray: [AVCaptureBracketedStillImageSettings], completionHandler: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Allows the receiver to prepare resources in advance of capturing a still image bracket.

items.name: var isLensStabilizationDuringBracketedCaptureSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the capture output supports lens stabilization across the duration of a bracketed capture.

items.name: var isLensStabilizationDuringBracketedCaptureEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to stabilize the lens across the duration of a bracketed capture.
